home.title: Lateen Impact
home.subtitle: Not all of us have the same opportunities. But we all have more opportunities than we think.

opportunities.description: Scholarships, tournaments, olympiads, exchanges, free courses, etc.

community.description: Young people helping young people, with support from mentors, former scholars, and volunteers.

curation.title: Content curation
curation.description: Summary of calls for applications, tips, and practical guides.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Lateen Impact seeks to democratize access to educational and personal development opportunities for young people, connecting them with resources, programs, and communities that enhance their future.

intro.p1: Lateen Impact was born in 2019 from the personal experience of its founder, Luc√≠a Mart√≠nez, who during her adolescence discovered almost by chance a scholarship that allowed her to study abroad and completely changed her educational and professional trajectory.
intro.p2: Upon returning to Argentina, Luc√≠a realized that many talented young people with potential never got to know about opportunities that could transform their lives, simply due to lack of information or not knowing how to access them. Thus, the idea of creating a platform that would democratize access to these opportunities emerged.

firstSteps.title: The first steps
firstSteps.p1: What began as a simple blog and an Instagram account where Luc√≠a shared scholarships and opportunities she found, soon became an active community. Other young people who had participated in similar programs began to join as volunteers, contributing their experience and knowledge.
firstSteps.p2: In 2020, during the pandemic, the project took a significant leap: the need for information about virtual educational opportunities grew exponentially, and Lateen Impact responded by organizing webinars, creating detailed guides, and establishing a virtual mentoring system.

growth.title: Growth and evolution
growth.p1: Over time, Lateen Impact evolved from being a simple dissemination channel to becoming a complete support ecosystem for young people seeking opportunities. We developed three fundamental pillars:
pillars: Opportunity sharing: We expanded our coverage to include not only scholarships, but also competitions, leadership programs, exchanges, and more.
Active community: We formalized our network of volunteers and mentors, creating spaces for exchange and mutual support.
Content curation: We developed our own resources such as guides, templates, and practical advice to facilitate the application process.

impact.title: Impact and results
impact.p1: To date, Lateen Impact has helped more than 5,000 young people find and apply for educational opportunities. More than 500 of them have obtained scholarships or participated in international programs thanks to the guidance and resources provided by our platform.
impact.p2: Our team has grown to include more than 30 active volunteers in different provinces of Argentina, and we have established alliances with universities, foundations, and educational organizations that share our mission.

future.title: Looking to the future
future.p1: Lateen Impact's journey continues. Our goal is to continue expanding our reach, develop technological tools that further facilitate access to opportunities, and create our own programs that complement existing options.
future.p2: We firmly believe that access to information and educational opportunities should not depend on chance or privilege. With each young person we support, we are building a more equitable future full of possibilities for everyone.

help.title: I need help
help.subtitle: We know that searching for opportunities can be overwhelming. That's why at Lateen Impact we want to accompany you every step of the way. Choose the option that best suits what you need:

findOpportunities.title: üìö I want to find opportunities
findOpportunities.description: We help you discover scholarships, competitions, olympiads, exchanges, and more.

getStarted.title: ü§î I don't know where to start

talkToTeam.description: You can contact us through social media or email, or request a brief call to resolve your doubts.

questions.title: üí° I have a specific question
questions.description: Check our frequently asked questions or write to us directly.

volunteer.title: I would like to volunteer
volunteer.subtitle: ü§ù Be part of Lateen Impact as a volunteer!
volunteer.intro: Do you want to help more young Argentinians discover and take advantage of educational opportunities that can change their lives? At Lateen Impact, we look for people with social commitment, passion for education, and desire to build community.

whoCanVolunteer.title: üåü Who can be volunteers?
whoCanVolunteer.description: You don't need previous experience, just willingness to contribute. These are our basic requirements:
requirements: Live in Argentina (or be committed to the education of young Argentinians).
Have internet connection and basic digital tools.
Be able to dedicate at least 2-4 hours weekly.
Share values such as empathy, inclusion, equity, and commitment.

terms.title: üìú Terms and conditions of volunteering
conditions: This is a volunteer role, unpaid, and does not create an employment or contractual relationship.
We protect the confidentiality of information that circulates within the team.
We foster a safe, collaborative, and non-discriminatory environment. Violent or disrespectful attitudes will not be tolerated.
Content created as a team can be used by Lateen Impact for educational or dissemination purposes, acknowledging authorship when appropriate.
You can end your participation at any time, with advance notice.
We reserve the right to terminate participation if these conditions are not met or if the well-being of the team is affected.
